column4: I've tried a bunch of settings for a static IP, Network manager - manual , interfaces file, resolv.conf - I have no trouble setting my IP, but cannot reach the router unless ip is automatic. Am I missing something obvious
you have to set ip, netmask, gateway, dns
make sure not to use an IP from router dhcp-pool
you have to setup wpa_suplicant or something if you don't use networkmanager
you've setup IP but not the underlaying wifi-stuff
